testcase.classname: Demo application with dynamically generated element attributes
testcase.name: Fill in and submit the form. For successful login
testcase.system-out: Given User in the home age of "uitestingplayground".........................passed And click on the "Sample App" section.......................................passed And try to login with "valid" user name "anyUser" and password "pwd"........passed When click on the login button..............................................passed Then user has logged in with "Welcome, anyUser!"...........................passed

testcase.classname: Demo application with dynamically generated element attributes
testcase.name: Fill in and submit the form. For failed login
testcase.system-out: Given User in the home age of "uitestingplayground".........................passed And click on the "Sample App" section.......................................passed And try to login with "invalid" user name "" and password "pwd".............passed When click on the login button..............................................passed Then user has not logged in with "Invalid username/password"................passed

testcase.classname: User try to handle most types of delay from ajax, load and client side delays
testcase.name: "try to handle elements may appear on a page after loading data with ajax or client-side time consuming"
testcase.system-out: Given User in the home age of "uitestingplayground".........................passed And click on the "ajax delay" section.......................................passed When click on "ajax delay" Button...........................................passed Then the message of "Data loaded with AJAX get request." "ajax delay" is appeared after 15.passed

testcase.classname: User try to handle most types of delay from ajax, load and client side delays
testcase.name: "try to handle elements may appear on a page after loading data with ajax or client-side time consuming" 2
testcase.system-out: Given User in the home age of "uitestingplayground".........................passed And click on the "Client Side Delay" section................................passed When click on "Client Side Delay" Button....................................passed Then the message of "Data calculated on the client side." "Client Side Delay" is appeared after 15.passed

testcase.classname: User try to handle most types of delay from ajax, load and client side delays

testcase.classname: Scrolling an element into view may be a tricky task
